waffleoRai_cafebotCommands

Class MessageListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dv8tion.jda.core.hooks.ListenerAdapter
      • waffleoRai_cafebotCommands.MessageListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.dv8tion.jda.core.hooks.EventListener

    public class MessageListener
extends net.dv8tion.jda.core.hooks.ListenerAdapter
    A simple listener that can be registered to a JDABuilder for a bot to screen all messages sent to a channel for potential commands and send them to the ParseCore.
    Since:
    July 1, 2018
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Blythe Hospelhorn

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Construct a new MessageListener linked to a ParseCore.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MessageListener

        public MessageListener(ParseCore pc,
                       boolean v)
        Construct a new MessageListener linked to a ParseCore.
        Parameters:
        pc - ParseCore to link listener to - that is, the ParseCore the listener should send its commands to.
        v - Whether to additionally print all messages heard by the listener to stdout.

    • Method Detail

      • setVerbose

        public void setVerbose(boolean v)
        Update the verbose setting of the listener. When the listener is in verbose mode, it will echo each message it hears to stdout. This can get messy, so use with caution.
        Parameters:
        v - Verbosity setting

      • onMessageReceived

        public void onMessageReceived(net.dv8tion.jda.core.events.message.MessageReceivedEvent event)
        The function to call when a message is received.
        Overrides:
        onMessageReceived in class net.dv8tion.jda.core.hooks.ListenerAdapter
        Parameters:
        event - The event which triggered the listener.
